response.overview: This musical comedy tells the quest of Thing Pogo, a bus driver suffering from "liver psychosis." through 14 humorous songs he navigates the tumultuous landscape of contemporary society. Witness and actor in the violence caused by isolation from social networks, difficulties in accessing housing, and the new reality of flirting, Thing seeks refuge in alcohol, drugs, and technology. However, despite the chaos, his family remains a beacon of hope, offering him support and protection in a touching and sometimes funny way.
response.title: On est tous fous
